reviews.review_text: First time Customer alert Came in for a girls night. Happy Hour ~ I had the mac and cheese that was amazing. -Perfect balance between rich cheese flavors and a satisfyingly gooey texture.   Pairing this delightful dish with a flight of craft beers is a match made in heaven. -The server knew we had a long day and just wanted to talk, so they made sure we had our space to talk without interrupting. The inside was a lot bigger than I thought and had an outside patio as well. -Would come back and recommend though I do wish their happy hour served more options or a bit of later happy hour window.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: HI Julian, thanks for all the STARZ and kind words.  we do hope to see you again soon!  cheers until the next time!

reviews.review_text: Great place yo have beers in East Van. Life hack: They dont serve food so they let you bring your Down Low Chicken meal to eat here and will even offer you a discount on your first tap beer. Amazing. Good service, environment and quality.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Roberto, thanks for all the STARZ!!  One note though, we do serve our own food and we also have Saltys Lobster Shack that operates right out of our brewery.  DL is always welcome too!

reviews.review_text: Great beer! Fantastic quick service, and the best lobster man n cheese I have ever had! I will definitely return!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Brandon, thanks for the STARZ and kind words. Everyone here thanks you for the review and we cant wait to see you again!

reviews.review_text: Great little brewpub just off The Drive. Really enjoyed the Jasmine Rice Lager.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Steve, thanks for all STARZ...super happy you enjoyed the beer.  Hope to see you again soon.   Cheers!

reviews.review_text: Cute little brewery and brewpub in a nice neighbourhood, service was prompt and good, had a good view of their brewing tanks right next room. Beer was ok, nothing spectacular, but main point was to cool down a bit during a hot day so it served it purpose well.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Jussi, thanks so much for the great review and all the STARZ!!  Hope to see you again soon.

reviews.review_text: Outstanding service!! All of the staff were super friendly. I was here with some friends and dont really drink much beer, the boys behind the bar were more than helpful helping me choose one! I ended up having the Blackberry sour and it was delicious! I must say, the music selection was excellent, you could tell whoever was in charge of the music could really read the room.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey there Zaya, appreciate all the STARZ and so happy to hear you enjoyed the sour...come back soon for the barrel aged cherry which should be ready soon!

reviews.review_text: Sat down Friday night at east van brewing with a group of five friends, we were very nicely welcomed by our tables waiter in a timely fashion. Our waiters name was Drake he was really happy and positive bringing great Friday vibes along with fast and attentive service. drinks were good and cold! food was good and hot! all around awesome experience. Would come back for the good Time vibes from the waiter! Thanks Drake!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey kellan, thanks so much for the STARZ and kind words.  Well pass along a praise and give Drake a high five!  Look forward to your next check visit.

reviews.review_text: I had my first dinner here after restaurants are opened again for dine in. Normally I m not really into pub food but honestly I haven t have anything as good as the food here for awhile. Wait time was short, excellent food, plus they use natural wheat straws which won t turn mushy like the paper ones. Definitely go back to try more lobster dishes
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Emma, thanks so much for the kind words, support and all the STARZ!!  hope to see you again soon!

reviews.review_text: Very convenient spot close to the start of Commercial, with outdoor seating and a huge indoor space (top and bottom levels). There s cool art hanging around for sale and amazing (rock) music. Saltys the lobster shack is the restaurant portion of this brewery and the lobster rolls are AMAZING. We ordered a grilled cheese, a Maine (cold) lobster roll full order and a half order lobster roll with bisque that came with a huge chunk of lobster! Everything was delicious albeit a tad salty but thats okay, I just drank more beer ;) Beers here were pretty good! I tried the jasmine rice beer (same one sold at the Lunch Lady, a highly recommended Vietnamese restaurant on Commercial) which was very light, and also the Hef. Would try their pale ale next time when we re back! Saltys had last call just before 8pm on Sunday but the brewery still serves snacks (like sausages) afterwards so just a heads up! Will definitely come back!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Bee Dub, thanks so much for all the STARZ and support.  We will pass along your ringing endorsement to Saltys as well and we most certainly hope to see you again soon!!

reviews.review_text: Loved this spot! Atmosphere abs decor was super cool and the staff there was very friendly. We ordered the flight of beer to try out different options and we were not disappointed. Our table also ordered the flight of pickle, while I m not a pickle fan, I thought that was a great idea! We also ordered lobster rolls from the Salty s food truck that s inside this brewery. That was quite enjoyable as well! We had a great time with our friends there. Would recommend uk anyone looking for a chill place with good food and beer!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Bonnie, thanks for stopping by and the amazing review.  we appreciate the support and all the STARZ!!  hope to see you again soon.

reviews.review_text: As others mentioned, the atmosphere at the East Van Brewing Company in Vancouver is fantastic. I m more of a drinker of spirits but I ended up enjoying the community lager (if I m not mistaken, they called it that). Not a bad spot to watch the Vancouver sunset too. Great music too. East Van Brewing Company is a great spot for drinks and we d definitely visit them again!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Jordan, thanks for all the kind words and STARZ!!!  We appreciate you and the support, hope to see you again soon for more Community Lager!

reviews.review_text: They have a variety of fresh brews and also serve food. I tried an eclectic flight and the featured lobster sandwich roll. In all it was a primo date night. They also have some cool merch and beers (cans or growlers) to go.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Jessica, thanks so much for all the STARZ and kind words.  We appreciate the support and hope to see you again soon!

reviews.review_text: Came for Saltys lobster combo. Was delicious and made my day. Had a jasmine rice lager which went down very smoothly and had nice hints. Outside seating was plentiful.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Nicholas, Thanks so much for the kind words and all the STARZ, very much appreciated!  See you again soon.

reviews.review_text: Love this place, Great beer! Great staff! Always accommodating definitely check it out if you haven t been!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Brydon, thanks the STARZ and kind words.  Appreciate it and hope to see you again sooner than later!

reviews.review_text: Food was delicious. Service was fantastic. I actually highly recommend the pickle flight for those who love pickles. It was something fun and different. I really dig your guys vibe. It was great.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Lauren, thanks so much for all the STARZ and super kind words!!  See you again soon!

reviews.review_text: Great space with a crowd or alone. Unholy Nitro Stout is the closest stout to a proper Guinness anywhere. Worth a visit!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Christina, you are the best!  Thanks for all the STARZ!!  Look forward to a stout with you soon!

reviews.review_text: Great selection of beers and a very chill atmosphere. Awesome  food by Saltys Lovster shack. Love their Jasmine rice lager!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Vancity Cook, thats so much for the kind words and STARZ.  We appreciate the support and hope you come back soon!!

reviews.review_text: I had a flights, all tasted VERY good. Really good.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Marc, thanks so much for all the STARZ!  Super happy you enjoyed our beers.  Cheers!!

reviews.review_text: Came around 3pm on a weekday.  Enough free parking around and so close to Commercial Drive.  Lots of outdoor space.  Our server was quick with requests and was courteous.  I had the Maine Lobster Roll with some ketchup chips.  I was expecting some fries but the roll was very good. The IPA beer was the best out of my 4 flight.  Not a fan of the honey brown ale.  Support our local breweries!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the support, kind words and all the STARZ...much appreciated.  We would like to think that we have a style of beer for everyone!

reviews.review_text: The Lobster Combo is amazing!!! super tasty soup and the roll. I can eat more! Definetely will come back and eat it again!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Tycho, well pass the message along to the Saltys Lobster Shack team!

reviews.review_text: I ve been coming to this brewery for a couple months now and I must say it s one of my favourites. From the quality beer to the friendly staff, I definitely recommend this brewery to anyone.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Zach, thanks so much for all the STARZ and support. Hope to see you again soon, Cheers!!

reviews.review_text: Nice place Cozy atmosphere Tasty beer
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Arash, thanks for all the STARZ!   We appreciate you business and support!

reviews.review_text: First things first, the brewery is not salty lobster and salty lobster is not the brewery. Anyway, the brewery is pretty cool, the beer selection enormous and the staff gorgeous.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Veloboy, we would like to give you a 5 star review for understanding the concept and relationship we have with Saltys!  We also want to thank you for all STARZ and support.  We also think our staff is gorgeous and are happy you enjoyed our beer!  See you again soon!

reviews.review_text: A great new addition to the area. Good choice of beers on tap and hard booze for people who dont like beer. Lots of seating available as well.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi James, apologies for the crazy slow reply...thanks for the support and love!

reviews.review_text: Good vibes, plenty of space in and out. Their current sour beer is refreshing and a wonderful summer drink. So happy Saltys posted up in East Van brewing. I tried the Maine lobster roll for the first time and its incredible. Theres an option for half the roll + lobster bisque but Im tiny and wolfed it down. Soo good.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Meesh, thank you for the kind words, support and all the STARZ...see you again soon!!

reviews.review_text: At the root of every successful business there is a passionate and dedicated owner with a vision to offer a quality product and services to their community and City. Andy has clearly demonstrated his commitment to be just that person. We love your passion and magnetic personality. How can anyone resist your amazing brew made with love and natural ingredients. Keep up the great work ....Youre a rising star. See you soon.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the amazing review and all the STARZ...you guys rock! hope to see you at the brewery for a few pints soon!!

reviews.review_text: What an awesome Brewery! So many great things to say about this one. A big shout out to them letting us bring our Download Chicken to eat with our drinks. This is a special partnership they have with each other. So, happy we were able to do this! They have a great range of beers...of course! And the best non-alcoholic drinks too. Love the vibe and the artwork in there right now.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey there, thanks so much for all the STARZ and super kind words.  Come back anytime!!

reviews.review_text: Brilliant bar, food and drink was amazing, staff were super pleasant too, will be returning again
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Paul, we think youre brilliant too!  Thanks for the STARZ and see again soon!

reviews.review_text: Excellent experience, some great beers to try with their 4 beer flight or 6 beer cross, we also had a sleeve of a porter with coffee notes. Their renowned IPA (not sure of name) was good, considering I dont personally like IPAs
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the STARS Tyler!  sorry we missed this but we do appreciate, hope to see you after this craziness...cheers!

reviews.review_text: Love it!!! I was able to order a flight of beer and had takeout from Downlow Chicken to eat inside East Van couldnt have a better collab! #OnGoogleMaps @googlemaps #LetsGuide @googlelocalguides #604 #VanCity #Food On Insta: @gestler.mendoza
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Awesome Gestler!  Thanks for the STARZ!

reviews.review_text: Yo it s a chill vibe there, the beers are different flavours. We were a pretty big group, moving around and probably being kinda confusing but they helped us out, much appreciated. Shout out to the girl with blonde hair and glasses!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Alec, appreciate all the STARS and kind words.  Glad you had a good time and hope to see you all again soon! Thanks for stopping by

reviews.review_text: Went here last weekend on a brewery tour. You definitely need to try the pickle flight, jalapeno is the best! They also have crib boards which is a fun idea. Will definitely be back.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the review and the start Brittni!

reviews.review_text: Support Local!!! We re back for more delicious lobsters       Thank you!!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Eddie for the kind words and support, we appreciate the opportunity to serve you and thanks for the STARZ!!

reviews.review_text: Amazing restaurant brewing love the flight and staff especially Beck was awesom rave reviews and positivity in this place, good foo
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the stars Nadim

reviews.review_text: Ive been to a lot of breweries and this is one you want to visit. Great variety, funky space, and friendly staff. Come while its still relatively unknown to the general public!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the stars Jay!

reviews.review_text: I love how they have a flight of 6 beers and that the flight is shaped like a cross. A really nice touch, and nice to have a couple extra beers in your flight rather than the standard 4. We also got the pickle flight which was a lot of fun to try. It was very good along with the grilled cheese. Service was good and the staff were all very kind and seemed to really care about giving good service. The ambiance inside was also very nice. Cant wait to visit again sometime!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Erin, thanks for the STARZ, kind words and support...very much appreciated!!  come back anytime!

reviews.review_text: We went here since it was one of the few breweries open until 11. The jasmine rice lager was sooo delicious. I didn t particularly like the others I tried. Service was good. I felt that the round tables are way too big and it s hard to talk in a group.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Hana, thanks a bunch for all the STARZ!!  We appreciate it and would love to see you again soon...cheers!

reviews.review_text: Great selection of beer combined with a cool space . Fun new lace to hangout .
reviews.response_from_owner_text: appreciate the love Paul, glad you are enjoying it!

reviews.review_text: One of our stops on a brewery crawl with family from California.  Was recommended by a good friend and exceeded my expectations.  Excellent food..the Gouda bombs were delicious Loved the pickle flight!  Great choices of beer.  Im not a beer drinker but had a cider and enjoyed it.  Not too sweet and dry.  Also had the lobster grilled cheese and lobster bites from the Lobster Shack.  Will definitely go back!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Irene, we are so thrilled that you and your family and our neighbors to the south enjoyed everything.  Thanks for the STARZ and support, we appreciate it very much!! Please be sure and thank your friend for recommending us too. We hope to see you again soon!  Cheers

reviews.review_text: Great beer, and the staff are nice too!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Mike, thanks for all the STARZ and kind words!

reviews.review_text: Awesome space. Have to do the East Van cross flight if youre there for the first time. Lovely service. Will def be back.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Ben, so sorry for the super slow reply.  We appreciate the love and support!

reviews.review_text: They have a great selection of in house beers, my favourite is the Jasmine Rice Lager
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Will, thanks so much for all the STARZ!!  Hope to see you again soon.

reviews.review_text: Great find, right off The Drive. Good atmosphere,vintage look,  really good beers on tap. To go as well, and Salty Lobster is a great addition. Plus they have a great snack style menu. The staff is very friendly, attentive and enjoy looking after the guests. And the owner, Andy,  has years of experience in the hospitality and food industry. Really knows what he is doing and what will work. Especially during these challenging times we are in. We live in White Rock, but it is well worth the drive. It is our Go To place when we are in Vancouver.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Rick for the support and kind words as well as all the STARZ!!!  very much appreciated, come back and see us again soon.

reviews.review_text: The staff here are so incredibly nice and welcoming! Come for the beers (they re amazing) but stay for the vibes!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey H H, thanks for the STARZ and kind words.  Well pass it along to the staff and hand out some high fives!!  See you again soon.

reviews.review_text: My partner and I have been coming to East Van Brewing Company since they opened and we have never been disappointed. The food and beer is great, and the staff are lovely too. Plus the atmosphere is very cozy. I recommend ordering the porter and the lobster grilled cheese!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Karilee, thanks for the support and all the STARZ...youre amazing and we appreciate you!!

reviews.review_text: Great selection of beers and a fantastic atmosphere... whats not to like??  Make it a must stop on your next craft beer crawl!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for all the STARZ Glenn!!  We appreciate the kind words and support, see you again soon.

reviews.review_text: Great beer and food. The patio is amazing! The lobster roll is packed and full of flavour.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Dion, thanks for all the STARS and kind words.  Hope to see you again soon!

reviews.review_text: Love to enjoy a flight of beers here. Good selection. Staff is friendly and knowledgeable. Cool space with lots of room. Courtesy plugs for electronics makes EVB a perfect place to refuel and recharge if you re near The Drive.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey John, thank you for the support and kind words plus all the STARZ...much appreciated!!

reviews.review_text: Best stout in the city and its not even close
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Drake, we think so too!  Thanks for the STARZ and herea to a few stouts in the bear future!!

reviews.review_text: Despite living in the area, it took me a few years to get to this place. And now, I feel like I had been missing out. Every beer I tasted was good. The venue is large and spacious. I love the industrial look of this place, wood beams, polished concrete, exposed cinder blocks and conduit lights on the wall. This place also serves food which is a huge bonus.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the stars Zhi!

reviews.review_text: Visited in mid afternoon Saturday, tables were starting to fill up but we got one easily. They check vaccine cards and ID which is always good to see. I got the new hazy IPA that the server advised was their first day serving it - was amazing, highly rated and would get it again. My partner got the nitro stout and loved it! Many know about the shortage of Guinness coming into Vancouver atm and he was delighted to find somewhere that served something almost as good as Guinness and can be bought in cans, well be returning to stock up for Xmas time. Would definitely return.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey B C, so glad to hear you enjoyed it all.  Thank you so much for all the STARZ and awesome review, we appreciate it very much!!  you are welcome back anytime.

reviews.review_text: Really enjoyed my time at East Van Brewing, diferent types of beer, and nice atmosphere to meet some friends.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: apologies for the slow response, we appreciate the feedback and hope you come back to say hi again!

reviews.review_text: I went to try out Salty Lobster Shack here for the first time mid week. The food was delicious, service was excellent and went the extra mile with an issue that happened after I had left the premises. I was presented the incorrect bill unbeknownst to me, most likely due to a staff shift change. Which I absent mindedly paid without verifying since it was an E-bill via a tablet. I did reflect on it later after seeing the bank confirmation sms, but didnt bring it up with East Van. They actually had noticed it later also and had already issued a refund which I got on Friday. I never brought it to their attention, they went ahead and did the right thing. Thats honest, top tier service right there! The gesture was very much appreciated!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Godfrey, we very much appreciate the kind words and all the STARZ!  its nice to get recognition and nice to hear that our staff are going above and beyond!  see you again soon.

reviews.review_text: What a great place to spend a Thursday evening! The food (we had Mediterranean and Cuban paninis) was delicious, the service was all smiles and friendly, the craft beer on tap was excellent, the non-alcohol ginger-beer was especially yummy. And the live music was excellent, entertaining but not drowning out the conversation around the table. Would def recommend this place. Just off The Drive in Vancouver.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the great review Marilyn!

reviews.review_text: Great selection of beers and a nice patio. Perfect for a cold beer on a hot day.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the support and for the STARZ!!  come back soon!

reviews.review_text: I was there yesterday and really enjoyed my beers after work but more interestingly a shadow passed behind me in the washroom blocking out the light briefly. I don t believe in ghosts but it did add to the interest of the place. Zero explanation to how that happened but I ll be returning  for the pilsners more often now that I m curious.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Quinn, we are happy to hear you enjoyed the beer.  thanks for the support and the STARZ, very much appreciated!!  as for the shadow, we dont know what to make of that but Happy Halloween!!

reviews.review_text: Great beers to start their new brewery! 7 selections and they have flights of 4 and 6. Small food program sourced from a selection of local providers. Really nice room, bright and airy. Cool branding as well.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Devin, not sure how we missed you but apologies in the crazy slow reply.  Thanks for the support and love...much appreciated, hope to see you again1

reviews.review_text: Awesome tasting variety of beers! The place is spacious and looks really cool. Great for group events or a casual pint or 2 at the bar. Love the beer to go, the have very reasonable prices. EVB one of the best breweries in Vancouver and a must visit for any brewery tour.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for this great review!

reviews.review_text: Great beer. Chill vibes. Awesome hang out spot and staff. Always reccomend a visit when in the area.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Rhett, thanks so much for the amazing shout out and all the STARZ!  We appreciate you and cant wait to see you again soon.  Cheers!

reviews.review_text: Great location, awesome operators and really good beers. Servers come to your table and they have bee hives on their roof and use it for their beer. How cool and tasty is that ?! Highly recommended if youre in the area or not! Worth the trip!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks so much for the support and feedback, we think the bee hives are super cool!!

reviews.review_text: Very balanced beer choices,  great food. Excellent service.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Miguel....Thanks for the support, kind words and for the STARZ!!  very much appreciated.  see you again soon!

reviews.review_text: Awesome place for a beer or to grab and go. They have something for every beer drinker, and a range of new styles or twists to keep things interesting. Great place to walk from the Drive or pull over when driving through east Vancouver (lots of free parking nearby).
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Spencer, thanks for the STARZ, kind words and the support...its very much appreciated, see you again soon!!

reviews.review_text: A great spot, good selection of beers and the lobster shack food is tops! Give it a go, the space is nice and large, everyone that works there (that I have met) are very nice.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Noah, thanks very much for the kind words and all the STARZ!!  we appreciate you and your support, hope to see you again soon!

reviews.review_text: Came in on Sat night for the first time. Very cool place and great beer.. especially enjoyed the lager. my server (robin) was very knowledgable & friendly. I am new to the city and she gave me great info on the vancouver craft beer scene
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for stopping by Maggie, we appreciate the kind words and the STARZ!!  we will pass along your praise to Robyn as well!

reviews.review_text: Still love coming to this great microbrewry. Great ambiance and beers. Only small selection of very tasty food. Hey having Murphy the brown dog as the door dog... simply makes this place one of my favorite. ill be back.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Jean Francois thanks for the stars!  Murphy will be happy to see you the next time you come by!

reviews.review_text: The picnic benches outside were perfect.  Spread out nicely and the Southern sun kept us warm. Andy, one of the owners is super hospitable and we will definitely be back.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Janice, we do really appreciate the support and the kind words...and the STARZ!!  cheers!

reviews.review_text: I organized a beer tasting party where we went to 6 breweries. This one was by far our favorite. They reserved tables for us and were able to accommodate our rowdy group. The beers were incredible and the staff were so nice to us.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Cheylene!  We are happy that it all worked out.  As we dont take formal reservations we do our best to try and accommodate groups when they can give us notice.  Thanks again for coming in!

reviews.review_text: Craft beer and Main Lobster Roll - you cant really beat this combo in Vancouver. The service is spot on and even though the beer selection is small it never disappointed. Especially the partnership with Saltys has boosted this place recently.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Pascal, thank you so much for the kind words and all the STARZ!!  we appreciate you and the support, come back anytime!

reviews.review_text: Very nice place, good atmosphere. Plenty of homemade   and good food.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Avner, thanks for stopping by and giving us all those STARS, see you again soon!!

reviews.review_text: Please go. Beers were ok, I mean not the best, but really ok. The barmaid was the best I ve ever had. She was so fun, we were doing the east van brewery tour, she made our night. Would recommend 100%.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the stars Patrick!

reviews.review_text: I love this beer personally, and sent my clients East Van Brew s for Christmas. Best gifts ever. Great beer, good people. Buy local. Support small business.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Chris, really appreciate the STARZ and support!!

reviews.review_text: The most exciting menu, and one the best vibes in East Van. The foodtruck looks amazing in the middle and foods are tasty. Parking is fairly easy to find in the neighborhood
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Hasan for the kind words and support, we are very happy to hear that you enjoyed it!!

reviews.review_text: I came in here with some friends on Saturday night. The place has a really good vibe and great beer. Highly recommend the scotch, which is apparently one of their top selling beers. Will defiantly go back.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: M Bhatti, apologies for the slow reply.  not sure how we missed you but we appreciate the love and support.  we have a new batch of beers since we opened and hope that you come down and give them a try...cheers!

reviews.review_text: Very nice selection or beer and a much bigger space than a lot of breweries in Vancouver which I like. Service here is super attentive and friendly, i will definitely be comingback.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Travis for the kind words and support.  We appreciate it very much! Hope to see you again soon!

reviews.review_text: I really like this place: the beers are great, the vibe is good and the snacks delicious. The beers here seem not those fruity flavoured brews or ultra hoppy IPAs...plenty of places already serve that demand well. Here, what they have are excellent (what I would term) traditional ales...not as hoppy, darker brews. And theyre really, really good: the kind of flavours youre likely to taste in the UK (though obviously served at North American temperatures....sigh). Though I live in Port Moody, walking distance from brewers row EVB is my go to place to fill the growlers. The vibe here is great: down a few steps (theres a handy elevator for those less mobile) and with a few mates it definitely reminded me of some bars in London....sink a few pints*, grab a snack and sit down for a few hours of banter. My only issue are the pints (hence the *). I really hope that EVB move to using proper pint glasses instead of what I think are more like sleeves. Every time I grab a beer Im thinking I REALLY wish youd serve me a proper pint and not this short measure #nomoreshortpints Otherwise, well worth a visit. Take your empty growlers and fill up too.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the review Brian!  And for the stars!   Give our GM a shout info@eastvanbrewing.com regarding the glass sizes.  The glasses we have are 16oz which is a US pint but shed be happy to chat with you!  Hope to see you back at EVBC soon.

reviews.review_text: Amazing service from this place, and delicious beers! We went with a bunch of annoying kids and they didn t even flinch. Highly recommended.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Matt, you are welcome to come back anytime.  We appreciate your support and the STARZ!!!

reviews.review_text: Saltys lobster roll was perfect!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Loring, well pass that along to the Saltys crew...by the way, how was the beer??

reviews.review_text: I have been here two times, once in the evening and once in the afternoon and I really enjoyed the outside setting and inside and the servers are always really sweet and helpful. Will definitely return!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for all the STARZ and kind words, very much appreciate the support!  See you again soon!

reviews.review_text: Really enjoy this place. Great beer and nice ciders too, good atmosphere. Staff were friendly and helpful. My boyfriend and I will be back again.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Heather for the great review, support and all the STARS, hope to see you again soon!

reviews.review_text: Great beer, below average meat board, warm pretzels  . They have an amazing community initiative where you can buy a beer for someone in advance and leave on the board for them to claim later.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the stars Ada, and the feedback on the meat board, we will work to try and improve it!  Come back soon!

reviews.review_text: Drake was cool. Made us feel welcome and took great care of us. Great vibes and great beers.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Kerry, thanks for all the STARZ and kind words.  Well give Drake a double high five for being awesome.  See you again soon!!

reviews.review_text: Great vibe, good selection of beers. Tonnes of street parking. Lots of Patio space and the Lobster Shack serving up goodness!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Derek, thanks for all the STARZ...very much appreciated!!  hope to see you again soon!

reviews.review_text: Awesome brewery, a decent selection of beers. Really nicely laid out bar area. Does serve a small selection of food. They do growler and carry out selections at a good price as well.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Daniel for the review and the STARS, much appreciated!

reviews.review_text: Best craft beer in Vancouver ;)
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the STARZ Adam!!

reviews.review_text: Ann-Elise (if that s how to spell it) was an unreal server. Also, we ve been to a lot of bars. We were given the best beers of mankind (2 each).
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Malcom, thanks for all the STARZ and support... Very much appreciated!!  We will pass along a bunch of high fives to Annalise for being her usual amazing self!

reviews.review_text: Great spot, excellent beer, very cool staff, dont forget to get your credit card back though...Im retarded.  On the plus side I have a good reason to go back and fill my growler.  - Fraser
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks!

reviews.review_text: I really like this place. Vibe is super chill, its kinda like hanging out in a friends basement   hazy pale ale is top tier!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Bailey, thanks so much for stopping by and super nice of you to give us all the STARZ.  We appreciate you and your support, come by again soon!!

reviews.review_text: fun place to try new beers and their selections are huge! Recommend getting their flights so you can try different flavours :)
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Michelle for the review and STARZ, we appreciate your support.  Come back soon!

reviews.review_text: Love. they even give you $1 off your first beer when you eat Downlow chicken takeout there! The beers are superb on their own and also with the DL fried chicken
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the stars Vanessa!

reviews.review_text: Love the vibe here and all the art work. Wonderful customer service and beers.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Jacob, thanks for all the STARZ, kind words and support.   We hope to see you again soon!!

reviews.review_text: The place has great drinks, a nice aesthetic, an AC DC pinball, some live music, and lovely staff. Ill definitely be back again!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Willem for the review and the STARS, very much appreciated!

reviews.review_text: My favorite place to buy beer in Vancouver lots of selection all brewed right there great food tables socially spaced outside so people can sit and enjoy a beer and some food in a great neighborhood Sunny patio
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Cindy, thanks so much for the STARZ and the support as well as the kind words...we very much appreciate it!!  see you again soon.

reviews.review_text: Great space for having a a few beers. Lots of selection with a number of award winng must try beers.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the STARZ Chris, very much appreciated.  Hope to see you again soon!!

reviews.review_text: Very tasty lobster food
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for stopping by Ken, we will pass along your kind words to the Saltys team.  Cheers!

reviews.review_text: Amazing beer and pickles!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the review Stephen, see you again soon!

reviews.review_text: Definitely one of the better ones in the neighbourhood. Quite enjoyed the selections. Great patio and great service. Will be coming for sure!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the review and the STARZ, see you again soon....CHEERS!!

reviews.review_text: Andy and his team produce great local brews with a uniquely Canadian humbleness ... do not overlook this brewery as they have certainly tapped into some hearts.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for the STARS and review, very much appreciated!

reviews.review_text: Great little brewery. Big fan of their Wheelbite IPA. Seating indoors is a bit awkward but their outdoor patio more than makes up for it.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Ash for the support and the STARZ!!

reviews.review_text: Great service, great beer, great music, awesome ambiance  A Vancouver must! Cheers
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Justine, thanks so much for all the STARZ and kind words.  We appreciate you and the support you gave us today.  Hope to see you again soon!

reviews.review_text: Great selection, fast service , and the space is super large and accommodating. Also, the 6 samples flights are just perfect!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Amine, sorry for the slow response and thanks for the love and support!  See you again for another flight or 2.
